story.name: Start Location
story.description:
A barren landscape lays before you, Paraiso. The gravel and carbon ground looks like a sea of cemented lava. 
 The ruble showing no evidance of life for miles around, with the sun looming above you, as if daring you to 
   test its might.

story.name: Distant Castle
story.description:
Across the coal ground you can see a distant shape, somewhat resemblant to a castle, though the heat waves before you 
 warps your preseption. A weird feeling befalls you, like a tugging feeling pulling you towards this 
 new adventrure

options.name: take a drink from your carton.

story.name: On the way
story.description:
As you move, you darkened garbs, chard by your last adventure, feels heavier and heavier. You make your way, but you look 
 to the side and see a faint shapes, almost like shadows, moving away from the distant castle. Then 
 you begin to notice.... The wind.. its screaming.

story.name: No way Out
story.description:
The landscape looks consitant. No real disturnable way to navigate, or landmarks to use for reference. As time goes by, you 
 see that there is a shape in the distance. The Castle.

story.name: The Domed entrance to a Cobble Castle
story.description:
An entrance, shaped in a welcoming donme, is made entirely of cracked stone bricks, and cobble. Clearly this castle had once 
 been great, but that magnigicance has disapated with time.
